item.title: Angela add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Man often becomes what he believes himself to be. If I keep on saying to myself that I cannot do a certain thing, it is possible that I may end by really becoming incapable of doing it. On the contrary, if I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Angela add a quote by Jiddu Krishnamurti
item.description: "The more you know yourself, the more clarity there is. Self-knowledge has no end - you don't come to an achievement, you don't come to a conclusion. It is an endless river." -- Jiddu Krishnamurti

item.title: Angela add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new." -- Socrates
